title: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream The interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream has many connotations and meanings, which are as follows: If a person sees fresh vegetables in his dream, this means that he will be blessed with kindness and many blessings. But if he sees damaged vegetables, this vision shows the crises that the dreamer is suffering from, and anxiety and sadness as well, and God I know. Eating vegetables in a dream is a sign of the abundance of nutrition that will come to the dreamer in the near future. This livelihood may be related to work, marriage, or both, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If a person sees vegetables with an attractive taste, this indicates that the viewer feels happy. And being satisfied with his condition. God gives him whatever he wants, but if its taste is undesirable, this indicates that the fortuneteller has befallen evil, and God knows best. Some interpreters believe that selling vegetables in a dream has good meanings and connotations, while Ibn Sirin disagreed on this statement. He sees that selling vegetables in a dream is undesirable and may indicate loss, and the more vegetables are sold, the worse things become. But if the sick person sees in a dream that he is selling vegetables, then this dream is good news for him of a speedy recovery, God willing, and God knows best. If someone sees His dream is that weeds are spreading around him wherever he is, and he feels fear during the dream. This vision assures him that it will reach him in reality, and God knows best. A dream about dry grass indicates the dreamer’s continued goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whoever sees in a dream that he is washing vegetables, this is evidence. However, the dreamer is tolerant with those around him and has a good heart, and God knows best. Dream interpreters say that eating vegetables in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is living a luxurious and rich life and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a person sees that he bought vegetables from the market and worked to cook them in a dream, this is evidence. However, the dreamer has lost someone he loves, and God knows best. Cutting vegetables in a dream indicates an abundance of good deeds or the fulfillment of his desires by the dreamer in reality. Or it indicates the dreamer’s upcoming marriage date. Cutting vegetables in a dream may indicate that the dreamer will be able to achieve profits. Abundant in the shortest period, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about green vegetables. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a single woman. There are many meanings for the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream, depending on the details of the dream itself. Among the most important of these concepts are the following: If an unmarried girl sees the one who is able next to her in a dream. This is evidence of the imminent marriage of a righteous young man to her, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl eating rotten vegetables in a dream means that she will suffer a financial loss. If a girl sees fresh fruit in a dream , green leaves are wrapped around it. This is evidence of the stability of the life you live, and that you rejoice in it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for a married woman After completing the interpretation of seeing vegetables in a dream for an unmarried woman, we move on to the interpretation of the dream for a married woman, which is as follows: A wife seeing vegetables in a dream is evidence of the stability of the dreamer’s life with her husband. Perhaps it indicates the husband’s loyalty to his wife and their love for each other.

title: Interpretation of the letter F by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The letter F is the twentieth letter of the Arabic alphabet and is pronounced [F] in a low voice. Explanation of the meanings of Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq The letter F in a dream The letter F represents many associations, the most important of which is seeing a mouse, coal, dawn, elephant, butterfly, pepper, oven, peanut, and many other symbols, which were explained by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq And we will explain it. Through this article.The meanings of the letter F for Imam Al-SadiqI mean seeing the dawn in a dream indicates the disappearance of problems and any challenges that the dreamer faces at that moment.The trap in the dream is one of the symbols that warns of falling into someone’s hands, hatred and jealousy, or a sign to carefully consider your decisions in The coming period and do not obsess over issues related to your life. The tiger in a dream is a symbol of glory, symbolizing the improvement of that person’s position and the acquisition of influence, status, or power. He also continues: Interpretation of the letter “Daad” in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq’s tilesImam Jaafar Al-Sadiq mentioned that seeing An ax in a dream is a symbol that indicates that everything is well and also indicates the dreamer’s new life. The dream of coal by Imam Al-SadiqCarbon OneSymbolsUnfortunately, it warns a person of injustice, trouble, and disaster when he sees burning embers. As for seeing ordinary coal or seeing it being bought in a dream, this Indicates illicit money. Seeing a dream about Imam al-Sadiq’s fur. The meaning of fur in a dream varies from one season to another, and dreaming of wearing fur in the summer is one of the signs of severe stress. The mouse in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq. A rat is a rodent. Seeing it in a dream portends jealousy or hatred because it indicates a conspiracy by someone close to him. Also continues: Interpretation of the letter Ta in a dream by Imam Jaafar Al-Sadiq. A butterfly in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Butterflies are one of the symbols of goodness in a dream, and it turns out that the coming period in his life will be full of good news and happy events, especially if this person has gone through a difficult period and suffered a lot. The oven in a dream. According to Imam Al-Sadiq, the oven is one of the symbols that symbolizes and represents the head of the family or the person who takes care of the affairs of the home and family. It is usually a symbol of the father in the dream of an unmarried woman and a symbol of the father. The husband in a married woman’s dream. Peanuts in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing peanuts in a dream is considered one of the most praiseworthy signs. For an unmarried girl, it indicates marriage to a generous and honorable man who seeks to provide her with a decent life. Follow also: Interpretation of the letter Ain in Dream of Imam Ja`far al-Sadiq Silver dream of Imam al-Sadiq Silver is also a symbol of goodness, as well as the disappearance of problems and fears for the dreamer, and is a symbol of good deeds. Pepper in a dream of Imam al-Sadiq Pepper, because of its green color, is considered a complement to vegetables, and is represented in the dream by the housekeeper. Seeing fruit in a dream Seeing fruit In a dream, it means very good and ample nourishment. Ripe fruits indicate good news. Seeing rotten fruit indicates worry, worry, and problems. Seeing dawn in a dream indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream through seeing the website roy2a.com. The pine tree is a type of tree from which edible grains emerge and there are many medical benefits for many diseases. Today, through this statement, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream according to great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of planting pine fruits in a dream. It indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and sustenance in his life. Eating pine in a dream shows that the coming period of the dreamer’s life will be full of happy events and promising news. Pine wood in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person who is not trusted by those around him due to his lack of honesty. Cutting a pine tree in a dream indicates numerous disputes and problems between the fortuneteller and his family, which could It may lead to the rupture of family ties. Sharing a road with pine trees in a dream indicates that the viewer feels safe and stable at this time. Larvae in a dream, which indicates that the dreamer will be nourished with a long life and good health, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing a pine tree in In a dream: It indicates a person who has good morals and reputation in the world, but does not have a lot of money. A pine tree in a dream: It indicates that promising things will happen in the dreamer’s practical life. Eating pine trees in a dream: It indicates a person who has the foresight to establish his own business, from which he will make profits. And great gains. Collecting pine cones in a dream shows that the dreamer will be blessed with many blessings in his life and a lot of kindness and blessings. Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream for a single woman. Seeing pine cones in a dream shows that there is a young man who will propose to her and suits her. Planting a pine tree in a dream for a single woman shows many positive changes In her life. Rotten pine in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that the dreamer was exposed to many worries and problems in his life during this period. Scattered pine cones in a dream for a single woman provided a lot of good nutrition and abundance for the viewer. Sitting under a pine tree in a dream for a single woman shows that he will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream for a married woman. Walking among pine trees in a dream for a married woman indicates the possibility of her traveling outside her homeland in the future, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman planting a pine tree at home in a dream indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Caterpillars in the house in dreams for married people and indicates He had many good offspring, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a pine tree in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant pine tree in a dream indicates that the coming period of her pregnancy will be comfortable and free of all the fatigue and difficulties of pregnancy. Collecting pine trees in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates that God will bless her with the first.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing animals in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see animals in a dream, dreams are messages from God in the form of images and visions seen in a dream, as this dream conveys a message and directs the person to a specific vision that God wants to show – glory. It is - for a purpose, that is, this dream usually has a clear interpretation according to the people of knowledge and religion. You find that many dreams are always searched for by people in their interpretation, such as the interpretation of the dream of seeing animals in a dream and other dreams that sweep us permanently, as animals have connotations. There are many in a dream and each dream has its own. Its own meaning, and we will next consider the interpretation of the dream of seeing animals often during sleep. Seeing pets in a dreamMany questions have spread about the interpretation of the dream of seeing animals in a dream, especially pets that many people see in a dream. Below: To dream of buying a pet means that you will have many good friends. To see that you are buying food for a pet: means that your skills will develop and that your talent that you are constantly working on will develop. To see feeding a pet: means that there are some people who will betray you in your life. Seeing Yourself eating pet food: means that you need to get rid of some thoughts in yourself. Seeing predatory animals in a dream Many people try to find out the interpretation of the dream of seeing animals often in a dream, especially when they see a predator in a dream, which causes panic in The person is more afraid than before, because predators are always a source of terror. And fear in our lives, and the next day we will review the interpretation of seeing predatory animals in a dream: Seeing a lion wounded and controlling it: means that you will defeat your enemies and make them submit to you. Seeing riding on the head of a bear: means the safety of oneself and the family. To see a hyena being struck with a sword: means eliminating the magic that It would have happened to you. Seeing yourself drinking fox milk: means the disappearance of illness, worries, and bad condition. But if these animals hurt you in a dream, this indicates the occurrence of disasters and catastrophes, God forbid. Seeing strange animals in dreams. Many people see animals in a dream, which makes them try to deal with With these animals and searching for an interpretation of the dream of seeing animals in a dream, especially strange and unknown animals to humans, as he sees frogs, bears, and others similar. They are animals that people do not usually see in their public lives as long as they are far from home areas, and below we will look at the interpretation of seeing strange animals in a dream: To see bears in a dream: means that there are problems in your life and you need to attack and eliminate them so that they do not affect you. Seeing frogs In a dream, it means that positive energy, love, and prosperity are coming, as your dreams and aspirations will soon come true. Seeing a dog in a dream: If it barks, it means that someone is talking bad about you, and if it bites, it means that you feel guilty. They will do it.Seeing a snake in a dream: If you see a snake

title: Interpretation of the letter Kha in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi in detail

preview.html: Seeing a ring in a dream for Nabulsi. The ring in a dream is one of the symbols that indicate power, a wife, safety, security, work and a prestigious job. A golden ring in a dream shows the birth of a boy, specifically in a pregnant woman’s dream. The lobe of the throat falling off in a dream portends the death of a son or the loss of money. Breaking the ring in The dream means divorce, abandonment, and separation between spouses or loved ones. An iron ring in a dream indicates a lot of goodness and living after a lot of fatigue and toil. Seeing a ring in a dream without a carnation in a dream indicates that the dreamer is looking for a job or something useless, and an ivory ring in a dream indicates certain topics worthy of praise in a woman’s dream. Silver in a dream has authority, prestige, influence, and strength, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about circumcision For Nabulsi, circumcision in a dream indicates purity, good news, and happy situations in the dreamer’s future life. Circumcision in one’s dream indicates an upcoming marriage, and not being circumcised in a dream indicates lack of religion, and God knows best. Mustard in a dream Mustard in a dream indicates poison in the dreamer’s life, and eating mustard in a dream indicates Bitterness that the dreamer suffers from in his life, or he obtains a lot of money but with diligence and fatigue, and God knows best. Slippers in a dream Slippers in a dream indicate money, servants, or avoiding the conspiracy of others. Wearing slippers in a dream means traveling closely, and tight slippers in a dream indicate distress, distress, or debts that affect the dreamer. Suffering, distress, and the slipper falling into the well or burning. With the death of this person’s wife, seeing new shoes in a dream is a debt on the dreamer, especially if they are tight, and God knows best. Seeing vinegar in a dream Vinegar in a dream is a sign of the blessing of money, piety, piety, and long life, and drinking vinegar in a dream indicates hostility and strife between the dreamer and his family, and the original vinegar in the dream Blessing and abundant sustenance. It is an indication of putting a lot of effort and effort into obtaining money, and God knows best. Wine in Nabulsi’s dream. Wine in a dream is a sign of forbidden money, and drinking wine in a dream is a sign of committing a sin and a great sin, and a river of wine in a dream indicates temptation in the life of this world. A pig in a dream for Nabulsi: A pig in a dream indicates the presence of an enemy in the dreamer’s life, a failure to fulfill a promise and a large number of debts. Riding a pig in a dream indicates a lot of money that the dreamer will get. Eating pork in a dream means that money is forbidden, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cucumbers: Cucumbers in a dream indicate the worries and sorrows that befall the dreamer, and eating cucumbers indicates the major problems that he suffers from. The thread in Nabulsi’s dream The thread in Nabulsi’s dream symbolizes evidence or an event that becomes clear It is clearly visible, and taking the thread is evidence of the fortuneteller’s need and his quest to know the truth, and tying the threads in the dream indicates magic, and God knows best. The baker’s dream according to NabulsiThe baker in the dreamer’s dream is evidence of safety in the dreamer’s life after intense fear, and a life of luxury and comfort, and

title: Interpretation of the letter J in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Dreaming of a buffalo in a dream of Imam Al-SadiqImam Jaafar Al-Sadiq stated that seeing a buffalo in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s serious effort towards achieving the goals of insight. The toil, exhaustion, and effort exerted to achieve what he wants is evidence of the gates of livelihood and its goodness, and God knows best. A dream of plaster in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq. Plaster in a dream is a sign of glory. And lasting strength and prestige, God willing. It is also a sign of the stability of the family and the good conditions of spouses and children. It is good news for recovery from illness and the stability of the fortuneteller’s condition in obedience and fulfillment of duties, and God knows best. Interpretation of the letter Jem by Ibn Sirin. Nabulsi’s interpretation of the letter Jem. The mountain in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. The mountain in a dream is one of the symbols that It indicates cruelty and harshness. A mountain in a woman’s dream indicates a hard-hearted husband who is strict and sharp in his letters. Also, seeing a mountain in a woman’s dream is one of the symbols that indicates her acquaintance with a hard-hearted man. A mountain in a man’s dream is a symbol of a harsh, quick-to-anger woman who is characterized by stubbornness and arrogance, and God knows best. A dream about cheese in a dream of Imam Al-Sadiq Cheese in a dream is an indication of marriage in the dream of an unmarried girl and an unmarried young man, specifically when seeing him eating cheese and the cheese tastes delicious and smells delicious as well. That, and cheese in a pregnant woman’s dream is one of the symbols that indicate the birth of a child from a female, and God knows best. Locusts in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Locusts are considered one of the unpleasant flying insects that can be seen in a dream, which means that the dreamer will be exposed to torture, distress, and many difficulties and challenges that he will go through. Dreaming of the forehead of Imam al-Sadiq: The forehead is the front of the head, and seeing it in a dream means pride and prestige, and seeing light on the forehead means justice in the dreamer’s condition and obedience to him, and raising the forehead means glory and power and breaking the forehead. In a dream, it denotes a broken spirit and loss of one’s status, or leaving work or humiliation and humiliation exposed to him after glory. Dream Watercress Imam Al-Sadiq Watercress in a dream, although one often sees vegetables, herbs, and most leaves are symbols that augur well in the life of the fortuneteller, but eating Watercress in a dream portends the dreamer a bad outcome and a serious warning to the pioneer to quickly reconsider his affairs, and God knows best. The rat in Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream. Rats are different from mice, and rats are afraid of light, unlike rats. To see a rat in a dream indicates a hypocritical and immoral person in the dreamer’s life, and seeing Mice eating in a dream indicate gatherings of misdeeds and gossip, and God knows best. The bell in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. The bell in a dream is considered one of the signs that alerts the dreamer or draws his attention to things that he ignores. It also symbolizes the upcoming journey, in addition to being a symbol of doing good. Eyelids in a dream of Imam al-SadiqThe eyelid is one of the symbols that carries many interpretations. As long as the eyelid is healthy and does not suffer from wounds or diseases, this indicates justice in the fortuneteller’s circumstances, and it is a good thing for him in general. The Lord of distress or the accumulation of sorrows and worries is upon him, and God knows best. Socks in a dream for

title: Interpretation of seeing pineapple in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of pineapple in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of pineapple fruit in a dream It indicates a lot of money and food that the dreamer gets. The dream of pineapple may indicate a blessing in livelihood. Seeing yourself picking pineapple in a dream can mean great profits and profits. The dream of fresh pineapple is a sign that you will hear good news. Interpretation of a dream of pineapple for a single woman The interpretation of a dream of pineapple fruit in a dream of an unmarried woman is evidence of the great benefits and advantages that she will obtain in the near future and earn money. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is eating pineapple and its taste is sour, this indicates the problems and troubles she suffers from. But if an unmarried girl sees herself cutting a pineapple in a dream, this means that she will hear happy news. Interpretation of a dream of pineapple for a married woman A married woman sees pineapple in a dream This shows the benefit and livelihood that she gets. The dream of pineapple in a married woman's dream indicates the blessing that will be in the diet. As for the dream of buying pineapple, it is an indication of the profits that she will earn from the trade she works in. As for eating Pineapple in a married woman's dream is evidence of recovery from illness. Dreaming of pineapple in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing pineapple in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of recovery from illness and the disappearance of worries. But if he sees in a dream that he smells pineapple, this indicates kindness and optimism. Interpretation of pineapple for a man Seeing a man in a dream that he is picking pineapple in a dream, this is a sign of happy news. As for seeing drinking pineapple juice in a man's dream, it is evidence of social relationships that bring him closer to some people. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the dream of drinking wine by Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol by Ibn Serendina Al-Islami prohibits everything that enters a person’s mind, and alcohol is one of the schools of reason that God Almighty has forbidden selling and circulating among people. It has connotations that vary depending on the fortuneteller’s situation, so we will present it to you in the article. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about drinking wine for unmarried womenDrinking wine in a dream for an unmarried girl can indicate promising meanings for her, as the vision can bring good news and happiness New for an unmarried woman. Seeing women alone drinking wine in a dream means that she will agree with the groom who will propose to her. On the other hand, if an unmarried woman dreams of drinking wine and tasting its taste, this means that her wedding date is approaching. Drinking wine in one’s dream means Also, good and abundant food for the dreamer. An unmarried woman seeing in her dream that she drank alcohol and was harmed by it, this is one of the unpleasant dreams. It may indicate the sins that she has committed. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing amulets in a dream and their interpretations. Drinking alcohol in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Alcohol in the dream also says Imam Al-Sadiq is a sign that the dreamer is committing mistakes and sins, and is a warning of the necessity of returning to God. Imam Al-Sadiq’s dream: Drinking wine in a dream if it is mixed with water, this means that the dreamer has been entrusted with money, some of which is permissible, and some of which is prohibited. Wine in a dream means that the dreamer obtains money through illegal means. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mute or deaf person in Dream Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is drinking alcohol, this is one of the unpopular dreams and may mean that she feels confused during this period and suffers from difficulty in making fateful decisions and other indications for the interpretation of the dream about drinking. Wine for a married woman is as follows: If a married woman sees in a dream that she abstains from alcohol, this means her righteousness, strong faith, and avoiding forbidden things. The vision also means that the dreamer is close to God. See also: Interpretation of a dream about returning to the old house and its most important connotations. Drinking wine in a dream for a man. If drinking wine in Dreaming of a man holding a glass of wine in a dream indicates that there is a girl he likes and he will propose to her soon. Seeing a man drinking alcohol in a dream indicates the following meanings: Seeing a single man drinking alcohol in a dream means that he wants to gain stability. Then the vision indicates that the dreamer will obtain the happiness that he has been waiting for for some time. The vision can mean a man’s promotion at work. Drinking alcohol In a single man’s dream, it means that his wedding date is approaching. While seeing him drinking alcohol in a married man’s dream means that the dreamer will marry again. Seeing a man eating from the foam of wine in a dream indicates his ignorance and lack of knowledge to act wisely in important matters. If he sees a married man in a dream That someone invites him to drink wine, this means that the dreamer is a weak person and follows others. See also: Interpretation of seeing a hat in a dream and its effects. Making and buying wine in a dream. As Al-Nabulsi says: Making wine means that the dreamer serves someone

title: Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream Today we are talking about the meaning of seeing a scarf in general after its interpretation in the dream of a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man, and as we agreed before. Each dream has its own details. A scarf is a social garment that expresses a high status at work. There is a judge’s scarf that represents justice, a prosecutor’s scarf, a student’s scarf at graduation parties and the like. Interpretation of a dream about a scarf in a dream: A scarf is everything a woman wears: a scarf, tie, or coffee in a dream. Winter. Seeing it in a dream is positive for a woman. A scarf in a woman’s dream shows her pride and self-confidence. Very elegant. A scarf in a man’s dream indicates an academic or social position. Whoever sees the scarf on his shoulder indicates his arrival to the highest positions in his work. The scarf symbolizes success for the student, because It states that wealth and riches. The meaning of seeing a scarf in a dream for a single woman. It shows that you see a girl with a scarf around her neck. Protect her and her safety. Despite your shoulders, it indicates security. Seeing a black scarf is a sign of social status and prestige. As for a white scarf, it indicates good news. The green ribbon symbolizes the fulfillment of goals and desires. Seeing a red scarf, the color is Emotion. The purple scarf indicates a positive change in one’s life and also symbolizes travel. A yellow shawl or scarf indicates fatigue and stress. Whoever sees a beautiful young man giving her a white scarf symbolizes his love for her and his engagement to him. The meaning of seeing a scarf in a dream for a married woman. A silk scarf in a dream indicates a married woman’s immunity, immunity, and Security. Whoever puts the scarf on her husband’s shoulder shows her interest in him. If she puts it on one of her children, this is a sign of their success. A man wearing a neck scarf for his daughter of marriageable age indicates the soon date of his marriage. But if he sees her husband wearing the hijab, it is a sign of pregnancy. Seeing the purchase of a wool or silk scarf symbolizes food And goodness.Interpretation of seeing a scarf in a dream for a pregnant woman. A woolen or linen handkerchief. It symbolizes the birth of a male child. Although it is made of soft silk, it indicates the birth of a female. The meaning of seeing a scarf in a dream for a man. A scarf in a man’s dream indicates pride, dignity, and glory. A handkerchief on the chest indicates Success and promotion at work. Add the dream you want to interpret with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

Eating a whole eggplant in a dream is evidence to the dreamer that the dreamer will achieve goals and desires and an indication of the pursuit of ambitions and desires. Seeing a whole eggplant in a dream, and it was out of season, indicates the dreamer who is suffering in life Coming and the beginning of troubles and sorrows. Seeing a merchant eating a whole eggplant in a dream indicates the abundance of money in his trade and for him it is a good omen, sustenance and blessing in his life. Eggplants in a dream whole at the same time is a sign that the dreamer will receive a lot of good news and a sign of success and success in His life in general. Eating eggplant in a dream is full of visions that show the return of the absent and the traveler, relief from sadness and the end of grief, and an indication of the satisfaction of her experience.
